title: Instructional Design for Fostering Creativity in Elementary Design and Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching foundational design principles and techniques
context.additional_context: Professional development program for elementary school teachers exploring strategies to enhance creativity in young learners through child-centered research

learning_goals: Learners can design creativity assessment tools by applying child-centered research methodologies
Learners can develop a systematic framework to observe the creative thinking stages of elementary students in design and technology education courses
Learners can incorporate children’s cognitive and emotional characteristics when designing creative problem-solving projects using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
